Articles.Content:
Hey there I really didn't do much in this forum other than ask a ton of newb Qs. But, I haven't introduced myself so here I am. Basically a casual gamer .. sorta .. as in I don't take any game too seriously. I have played a ton of them but i just can't get worked up about a game. Until this one. That has me a bit freaked out but i have actually cut back all of my other games because i really like this game!! I mean I love shootin stuff in planetside 2 (wurd to my outfit Black Widow Company) and I'm not about to quit that game because i really do enjoy the fellowship of the game as much as the combat. But this game ... it really hits me where i like.

I was the kid in my class when everyone talked about the pueblo's I was reading a book on the F-1 engine on the saturn V or grasping to understand the concept of TLI ... reading up on astrophysics and spacetime ... diggin the books on black hole theory. crazy really wierd kid ..

so this game takes me back to the stuff i really enjoy

I have gone a bit addicted to Mods but my computer is recently voiced itself as my intervention team .. sorting out what to drop and what to keep as we speak .. but i just wanted to say hello

peace all

btw? "scotty" in my procc "engine room" shuts er down at 3.4Gb lol .. "thas ih cap'n I got no more!" he said .. so i have to respect the man and lighten up the load ..

I feel like the overstuffed kid a the diner table that was told "no more cake" and the parents walk out of the room leaving half the cake on the table.

This is agonizing... "what mods do I drop?"

Edited January 18, 2014 by positivewun
Hello positivewun. Asking newbie questions is not a bad thing. Some of us enjoy helping new players.

Thanks Van I really do appreciate that. I'm sure I'll have more later

Really I have to say i have been appreciative of most of the community in here. They're all good sports so far. .... pretty cool place to chill really
